div.style: display: flex; width: 100%; justify-content: space-evenly; align-content: center

display:flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1em; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: rgba(96,165,250, 1); border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px -3px black; color: black; padding-top: 2em;

display:flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1em; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: rgba(254,202,202, 1); border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px -3px black; color: black; padding-top: 2em;

display:flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1em; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: rgba(254,202,202, 1); border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px -3px black; color: black; padding-top: 2em;
